name: Discord Of Darkness And Color V2
description:
So Discord just changed a bunch of stuff so I rewrote my style for it.
Most of the background options are from https://imgur.com/gallery/lkhbk88.
additional_info:
The "Background Image" setting changes the image in the background.
The "Main Color" setting changes the main color in the style. The default is red.
The "Main Color 0.5" setting is intended to be the same color as the main color, but with an opacity of 0.5.
The "Borders?" setting changes whether or not the style displays a bunch of borders.
The "Member List Slide In/Out" setting makes it so that if you select it, the member list will only be visible when you hover over it.
The "Backdrop Blur" setting changes makes it so that if you select it, the backdrop of some translucent elements will be blurred.
The "Friend List Gradient?" setting changes whether or not the style displays and gradient background in the friend list.
The "Mention Style" setting changes what mentions look like. The "None" option is just what it looks like without any styling from this style.
The "Cover Background" setting changes the opacity of the black background covering the background image. It changes how dark you want it to be.
The "Extra Background" setting changes the opacity of the other backgrounds that apply to specific things on top of the cover background. Like the sidebar or member list.
The "Solid Background" setting changes the color of other backgrounds that are opaque black by default.
The "Floating Background" setting changes the background color of various popouts. The default is the same as the solid background setting.
The "Textbox Background" setting changes the background color of textboxes.
The "Hyperlink Color" setting changes the color of links.
The "Low Saturation Hyperlink Color" setting changes the color of links when using a saturation setting of 40% or lower.

Edit 1: Styled a few more elements.
Edit 2: Same as above.
Edit 3: Re-styled the member list because it didn't affect the member lists in threads.
Edit 4: Styled a few more elements.
Edit 5: Added a new style setting.
Edit 6: Fixed the reactions under a message not being styled.
Edit 7: Added a border to the right click menu.
Edit 8: Styled the user popout and added another style setting.
Edit 9: Styled posts.
Edit 10: Updated user popouts.
